1.50.name: wordpress/taggator
1.50.description:
TagGator is an auto tagging plugin, Just write enter a few keywords representing your contents, TagGator will automatically scan your posts for these keywords, and tag them according to the results.

A Pro Version of TagGator is now available with the following features:

  • Auto Tagging: Your posts are tagged automatically when you create posts.
  • Autoblog friendly:Taggator works with most autoblogging solutions, tags are created automatically when the posts are generated.
  • Keywords To tags: Just write different keywords that represent you tags, Taggator will create the tags, and assign them.
  • Set & Forget: You only need to configure TagGator once. once done, you won't have to worry about tags anymore

Click here to learn more & get TagGator Pro
